website_summaries.verdict: This watch has an attractive design that's sure to bring compliments, plus a price that won't take too much from your wallet.
pros: Features a handsome bamboo face and case with a sleek leather strap
Feels lightweight and comfortable on the wrist
Comes at a surprisingly low price
cons: Several owners have complained that it's larger in person than they had expected
Some issues with the pins coming loose from the strap have been reported

customer_reviews.title: I gave them as a think you give to the men at my birthday party and they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: These watches was a hit. I gave them as a think you give to the men at my birthday party and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lj_96

customer_reviews.title: Woody watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch and I've received many compliments. The band is comfortable and the dial fits my wrist perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: crystal r. combs

customer_reviews.title: Real attention getter
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Attracts a lot of attention. Can't beat the price. Wish the band was a bit better quality - stained my wrist from sweat. Also photos a bit deceptive - the minute bars on the watch face are more defined in pix than in reality - almost invisible. Finally, based on experience with another brand of bamboo wooden watches, the watch band where it slips into the watch casing is very narrow making a replacement hard to find and will probably cost as much as a new watch, an ecological tragedy.
customer_reviews.author: Techview

customer_reviews.title: Attention gettet and unreal price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Best deal for a great watch. People always ask and i am hesitant to tell them its a $20 watch;) they usually dont beleive me...holds time pretty well ..gets about 5 minutes off after a month or two. The best thing is the band...i have had wooden watch before with wooden bands and if you live in an area with 4 seasons it will expand and contract and the band will break...Not this one...the leather gets better with age so dont be afraid to get it wet when washing your hands or dishes
customer_reviews.author: C. Lockard

customer_reviews.title: You "wood" not believe how much my boyfriend loves this
customer_reviews.text: Wow was this a hit! Bought for my boyfriend who loves working with wood, and he found it so unique and attractive. I was going to keep it for myself if he didn't like it. Hard to tell time with it, but that's not why you wear a watch like this. And what a bargain on Prime Day!
customer_reviews.author: Fast Walker Slow Runner

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected high quality, comfort and fit. I'm really impressed with this watch. I haven't worn a watch in many years, but decided to give this a try. I've found that many metal backed watches can cause skin irritation. I'm judging by the comfort of this watch that won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Others have noted the band is of poor quality, and I actually find it uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! If you are seeking admiration, I've had more comments on this watch in a few days than far more expensive watches, including those of clever function and design. If you seek a solid timepiece, this does the trick. Others have noted the band is of poor quality, and I actually find it uncomfortable. Expect to replace that. I take that as a given and give the watch 5 stars. Believe me, with a better band, packaging, and maybe a fancy little slip of paper explaining the bamboo materials and some bogus history and marketing, this watch could sell for many times over the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lindenberger

customer_reviews.title: He needed a nice watch to wear when we go out but he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband. He really likes it. He needed a nice watch to wear when we go out but he isn't a flashy person. This is a perfect watch if you have a man in your life that isn't much into flashy accessories but still has a good sense of style.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulia138

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to see how I would like a wood
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see how I would like a wood watch before sinking more money into an all wood watch. I love this little number and even though it did not break the bank, it fits my needs very well thank you. No need for an "upgrade".
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loved it! The fit is perfect and pretty standard. He loves the wood finish and how comfortable it is! It’s a really nice watch of you really like watches.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brice

customer_reviews.title: Groomsman Gifts
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect groomsman gifts for the day of. The packaging is perfect and comes in a bamboo round gift box, the watch sits in a burlap pillow inside. Perfect presentation for any gift giving occasion and looked great in photos too! Had to share our wedding pics cause this watch deserves the attention. Our groomsman loved them too, they love how sleek and simple the design is and it's very earthy style.
customer_reviews.author: Pompom

customer_reviews.title: Cucol Bamboo and Walnut Watches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the watches and received them quickly. Both are very attractive. I am disappointed with the bands. The band is .83 " wide, but where the band meets the watch is 1/2 inch. The cowhide band is very thin and discolors quickly. I was trying to determine if the bands have replacements as I fear they will not last long. I couldn't find any, but I posted on Amazon website forum. If I bought a band a 1/2 inch wide, it would look bad on a watch 44 millimeters wide. Bad business decision to use this band. I do like the watches very much. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Farsnott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Tells time with no physics numbers (big thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this new watch. 4stars just not sure about durability or water treatment of the band or face but I’ve gotten many compliments already just from owning it a week. Lightweight. Comfortable. Tells time with no physics numbers (big thing for me with watches) I believe this watch is a 42Mm Head.
customer_reviews.author: HouinHerrick

customer_reviews.title: Great style / mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, the strap is faux leather - IT IS DEFINITELY NOT COWHIDE - which after only one season of moderate use broke due to the quality. The watch still works fine but the strap has got to be improved. I got so many compliments with this watch but it's a shame that parts of it deteriorated so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Casey

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles underneath the glass and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The face of the watch had multiple bubbles underneath the glass and the leather strap felt very thin and cheap. Company emailed and asked if I had received the product and I told them about the bubbles. Their response was basically okay cool, thanks. So crappy product and customer service. It’s a two in one
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Attracts Comment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because it looked cool. It turns out to look cool enough that people comment on it nearly every time I wear it. Having the branding on the back means the face of the watch has an elegant economy of design that nicely complements the woodiness of it. The soft, suede-like tan leather strap is beautiful with it, but seems like a potential weak point in the long run but has held up well for the months I've been using it.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: the only issue I had was that the leather gets dirty very very easy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these now over the last 8 months. Plus; very lightweight. Got a lot of comments on it from others because it looks very unique. The watch itself works as expected, the only issue I had was that the leather gets dirty very very easy. I communicated to the seller and they sent me a replacement band twice, free of charge. This was excellent service and I hope they make improvements on the band to make it more dirt-resistent.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lin

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: On the fence with 4/5. Watch face is awesome...the band...be prepared to purchase a new one fairly early on, especially if you have small wrists. Watch band also doesn't hold color very well with daily use. Overall happy, but a new band within 2 months isn't ideal. *Update* Customer service wasnt helpful providing me with a new band option. Band isn't exactly what I would describe as "quality." Spend the extra coin on another brand if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Seyy

customer_reviews.title: Great  product.
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING PRODUCT! Order it a week ago, arrived on time as stated; design and material in great quality. Stylish, great look and attention grabber! Recommend it but be careful very delicate! Still at the price and quality worth a purchase. Thinking of two more but limited styles/designs. Birthday coming...grab one! Father's Day on the curve...grab one! Just because day near....grab one! Oh, customer service is outstanding also.
customer_reviews.author: M. EC

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden watch!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a wooden watch for some time, and this one was a great choice. It's very easy to read and very comfortable to wear. My only minor gripe is that, when moving my wrist, the band rubs against the case and makes a slight squeaking noise. It's not a huge problem, but I can hear it in a busy office. It reminds you of a squeaking floor. The watch is also a bit lighter than the picture reflects, but that was fine with me. Overall you can't go wrong on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Termitesforhire

customer_reviews.title: I do understand that thiswatch is not expensive at all
customer_reviews.text: I do understand that this watch is not expensive at all, but it did not last for more than a couple of weeks for me. First, there was a crack in the glass just after my second or third time of wearing this watch. I did not drop my watch, so I was very surprised to see this crack. And later on, the strap was broken, since it was not fixed properly from the very beginning. I am highly disappointed. Update: I contacted seller and they issued a refund, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in law. She and my son are always camping and hiking. She loves the wood face and this watch looks absolutely beautiful. I'll probablay ordering one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: For real??? This is AMAZINGLY well made for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: What is this beauty, artistic craftsmanship for this price???? I'm so happy and perplexed. The leather on this is even better than the photo, it's so soft smooth and the wood too... AMAZING it's so simple and cool and beautiful, you are sure to get tons of compliments, and it makes a great gift. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Echan

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Special
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend and she absolutely loves it. It's perfect if you're wanting to give a unique gift to someone special, or even to add it to your own collection and I think it is fairly priced. My only concern was that the strap is thinner than lets on in the product pictures but so far it hasn't broken or started to fray!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Asherah

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have anything really bad to say about the watch, it’s juicy not amazing. The watch looks like the pictures, which is a bit cheap. I don’t think it’s a bad looking watch but it definitely feels/looks like a cheap kids watch on your arm. Keeps time fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Gibert

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is allergic to nickel. He’s had several watches, all were high quality, and every single one irritated his wrist. This was the last option- bamboo! His skin is happy, it tells time, it looks pretty good on him. His only complaint is it’s not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Risucci

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, but not totally bad.
customer_reviews.text: The quality was not very good, but I guess for the price I should not expect much, but watches purchased on Wish for similar price was better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Unique Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the watch. The only thing that seems to be an issue is the clasp/ The pin that holds it together was too short, so the band kept un-fastening. I was able to have it repaired and it's fine. I've received many compliments on it and really like the fact it's so unique! I'm going to order a few more that I can give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... me one as a gift and it looked so awesome that I bought two more
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me one as a gift and it looked so awesome that I bought two more, different styles of course. They are very light and comfortable and the price is great! A lot of people at work have asked me, "Where did you get that?" So, I told them. I would describe them as very unique. A wooden wristwatch. Who would a thunk?
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Good, but band is really light
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but leather band is much lighter in color than it appears in the photos (not brown - almost tan). Buy one of the other similar bamboo watches for a darker band.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: nice watch. pretty unique and the price was right. I oiled with mineral oil to help protect the bamboo so I hope that doesnt do anything to it, but mineral oil is good for cutting boards so who knows.... I hope the watch lasts a good long time and I continue to get compliments on this. i which the band was a normal cut and size but whatever... hope it lasts a while too.
customer_reviews.author: Yoder648

customer_reviews.title: not my style
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, it is an inexpensive purchase. Just not sure I am a fan of the look for me. It is not a solid watch piece, very light weight and would not want to wear it if there is any chance it might get dirty or sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: andrew bednarek

customer_reviews.title: Quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Wore only a few times. Quit working and assumed it was the battery. Replaced with new battery and still will not work at all. Second hand never moves.
customer_reviews.author: TRP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, he loves it. It looks really nice, and the band looks great with it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Purchases
customer_reviews.text: The watch is high quality, and it is incredibly stylish. It will go with whatever you're wearing. I've had one of these watches for years, and it still works at peak performance. Most watches cost up to triple what this one goes for. A fantastic investment.
customer_reviews.author: Zarif

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful Man's watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my brother, who collects watches, and I feel liken this will be a great addition to his collection!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Walters

customer_reviews.title: I like the light weight feeling of this watch and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight feeling of this watch and it looks nice. I don't have any great expectation of this watch lasting very long, but the price point reflects that. The band has a weak spot where it attaches to the body.
customer_reviews.author: Champ Kine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a gift for my husband. It is beautiful and he really loves it. He started receiving compliments on it the first time he wore it.
customer_reviews.author: K Mc H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this watch!! I Love it & so does my man!! Beautiful piece of craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: willa b crawley

customer_reviews.title: no title
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband who likes it and it is light weight for his wrist, bought one for grandson too.
customer_reviews.author: Bedpan84

customer_reviews.title: This is the onlywatch I've ever worn that has gotten me compliments at ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is the only watch I've ever worn that has gotten me compliments at the Wendy's drive-thru AND the Burger King drive-thru. And those people see a lot of wrists so they would know. It's also comfy! Cons: It loses five minutes or so each week, and needs to be adjusted. A trifling complaint for such an effective conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jakeb

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch that everyone will want!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband and he loves it! He wears it all the time! He loved the wood facing, but even more, he loves the soft material on the band- makes it so comfortable to wear! He constantly gets compliments on the look of the watch, and it also works great! Will definitely buy from this company in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: it does not work - Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Can I give it ZERO stars?? Please give me that option. This watch looks good but the problem is that it does not work. I replaced battery (paid $6.00) and still doesn't do a think. Spend your $20.00 somewhere else and be happy.
customer_reviews.author: D from TX

customer_reviews.title: Great budget watch
customer_reviews.text: Super surprised by this watch. I wanted to try out a cheaper wooden watch before making a more expensive purchase. I will definitely wear this often, though. It keeps good time, fits well, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The leather strap is very cheap and I'm sure will break in no time. The watch itself is of poor quality too. I bought it for 15.00 so I won't return it. It looks ok, isn't meant to last.
customer_reviews.author: CRISPY

customer_reviews.title: You'll receive so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love how this watch looks and feels, and I have received so many compliments from friends, coworkers, and even strangers. I even let them try it on to see how nice and comfortable it is, and when I tell them the price, the general response is a shocked look of unbelief. And as a timekeeper, this watch has been very accurate. Great conversation-starter
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Unique watch, good gift!
customer_reviews.text: The band was lighter than I anticipated but overall a nice unique watch. It was a gift and the recipient did like it. Overall, a success.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Change the Band and you have an Elegant Watch
customer_reviews.text: The band cannot take any wear and tear. After only a couple times wearing this watch, the band looks like I have had it for several years. I suggest using a leather wood-grained simulated band. The design is nice but the aesthetics are not so nice after just a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Lott, Jarrett D

customer_reviews.title: + value for a little money +
customer_reviews.text: Presumably stable watch movement in an unusual case. It is still running after 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great in all ways
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful earthy looking watch. Comfortable, keeps time perfectly. I love the look of the wood. I love wearing it, it's so different looking from any other watch I have owned. The face is large but I don't mind that. Easier to read it and it makes my wrist look dainty.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Buonincontri

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice piece, with a nice price tag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece, with a nice price tag! The band is not top-quality, no, but it's not necessarily cheap. I've worn it for about a month now and there's very little wear and tear on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: I feel that the real object is more beautiful than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the real object is more beautiful than the pictures, and the price is directly proportional to the quality. I am very satisfied with this shopping. The fashion is simple and generous, the appearance is particularly beautiful, and the simple and fashionable styles can be worn with various clothes
customer_reviews.author: kenny martin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present from wife.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch, have gotten several "likes" from people on it. Keeps perfect time, looks really, REALLY good, one of my favorite presents!
customer_reviews.author: oibv305

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch but am disappointed with the quality. I wore it sparingly, about once per week. Recently, after a total of roughly 20 wears, the glass cover fell off. I have several watches and treat them with care. In the end, I guess you get what you pay for. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adams

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this watch so much! I get so many compliments on it all the time. I love the wood look and the tan leather ( maybe its fake leather but its nice none-the-less ) I say it is totally worth it for women and men ( I am a female and it isnt all huge on my wrist )
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a guy
customer_reviews.text: This is going to make a great gift for my uncle. It’s even more beautiful in person. I am a little worried that it won’t be big enough, but we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING looking watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprise on how good it looks, got it as a gift, and I'm in LOVE
customer_reviews.author: JVR VEGA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: A good looking yet inexpensive wooden watch. Battery fairly easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Save your $20.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it immediately. Poor quality, but I guess you get what you pay for. Band feels like it's going to rip off the watch - only attaches by about 1/4 inch on each side. Watch itself is thick compared to band.
customer_reviews.author: N. W.

customer_reviews.title: I hadn't seen the watches until I told my brother when he came to visit what a nice watch he was wearing
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father and brother for Christmas, they both tell me how many complements they receive. I hadn't seen the watches until I told my brother when he came to visit what a nice watch he was wearing. I laughed when he said it was the one I sent him as a gift. I will buy one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bf loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bf.. he loved it... it looks unique... the band seems to be some kind of leather or suede ... so don't wear wear continously..use it gently so the band wont seem wore out so fast
customer_reviews.author: Terry Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking & Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Father's Day. He has a big wrist & it fits perfectly. The color is a little lighter than photo, but still looks great! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Karin F

customer_reviews.title: nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm over 40 and haven't owned a watch since I was ten. I couldn't stand the weight and getting it caught when working etc...this watch weighs in at just under 29 grams with the battery and stays topside on my skinny wrist (I added a hole). The simple design and earth tones suit me perfectly. It has been about a week and I have not had to adjust the time. Don't forget to take it off when doing dishes or rough/dirty work and I bet it will last awhile .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun bamboo watch.
customer_reviews.text: The color is very true to the picture. If you want a khaki like bamboo color this is it. I unfortunately don't have a lot of items this goes with but the watch looks great on. Not too bulky for a watch but if you like something close to the skin this watch is not going to be it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Stolz

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves the watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the Christmas gift of this watch. Most unusual and he has many watches. It is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The materials are good (not great), it's clean, light, simple, is still working well (a few months out). Probably won't match with everything but I get compliments when worn. At it's price I have zero regrets, hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: After years of purchasing expensive watches for my boyfriend he asked me for this and it is his FAVORITE watch! Simple but nice. Looks good on the wrist. And I LOVE the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kovatch

customer_reviews.title: Great buy......just try it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend. I loved all of the wooden watches online, but didn’t want to spend lots of money on something I hadn’t seen in person. I decided to buy the Cucol. He loves it. The watch is light weight and pretty much goes with everything. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tall_girl

customer_reviews.title: Leather bands are always a problem
customer_reviews.text: It was a conversation piece and very beautiful workmanship, however, leather bands are always a problem. I bought the product in July and the straps fully gave way by February. I am going to buy another wood watch, but this time with no leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. The wood looks great and the band is very nice. It almost didn't fit my "gorilla arm", but I have a hole left. It came well packed and in a really nice box with foam padding. Would make a great gift but nobody is getting mine!
customer_reviews.author: Raddad

customer_reviews.title: The watch is really pretty and keeps good time
customer_reviews.text: The watch is really pretty and keeps good time. Watch band is a littlle on the cheap side, but the price was right and I can easily have that replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Peretz

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light material
customer_reviews.text: Got as a birthday for my brother in law he loved it.Is very light and the wristband isn't that thick but good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says! I would definitely buy again and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BennyDam

customer_reviews.title: The watch keeps good time and he has been complemented on it several ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He really likes the watch but plans on replacing the band for a higher quality. The watch keeps good time and he has been complemented on it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I have a large watch collection and this one is very unique and stands out. Wish they had a premium version with higher quality material and rare woods because I would definitely buy more, even at a premium price. I'll be keeping an eye out for more great products from this company
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: and beautiful that is perfect for casual wear and well made ...
customer_reviews.text: For the cheapest watch that I wear consistently it has gotten me the most compliments. It is incredibly simple, light, and beautiful that is perfect for casual wear and well made enough to wear to some more dressed up events as well. Highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Choksi

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch as a gift. It has received many compliments and the price cannot be beat. A name band wood watch from Tree Hut, which is identical to this one sells for $100!!! Why pay the difference if you cannot tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: AF1327

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Got the first watch and had an issue. Immediately got a replacement...no questions ask...and it is perfect. Great watch...great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: This is super unique! I would expect this watch to cost ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super unique! I would expect this watch to cost $70 +. I might buy another one or two in case this one poops out. Why not at $22??!!
customer_reviews.author: d-dub

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch and excellent quality and price
customer_reviews.text: beautiful watch and excellent quality and price. I get tons of positive comments when I wear it. The suede type band gets a little frayed on the inside as it isnt a smooth leather, but it doesnt take away from the fit or the look.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisL

customer_reviews.title: Received item and while it is super neat, the glass on the face is damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received item and while it is super neat, the glass on the face is damaged. I just gave it to my husband and I didnt even examine it first. I feel like an ass.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch , very unusual
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! We bought this for a young nature lover for Christmas. Nicely boxed, lovely watch. We are sure he will love it! The seller sent a very nice thank you note and encouraged us to contact him if there is any issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.P

customer_reviews.title: High fashion at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very unique. The first reaction from my wife was "WOW"! I love the style and simplicity of this watch. High fashion at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Hall Studio

customer_reviews.title: A great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: The watch was beautiful as it was pictured. I gave it as a gift and my father-in-law lived it. It was a bit larger than it seemed in the picture but was a wonderful gift. Shipping was fast and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: I like it better. It's very nice to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I like it better. It's very nice to wear. It's also very comfortable. The texture is OK. Very satisfied with a shopping! More affordable than the same model, looks good texture, very beautiful, value for money. It's convenient and classy. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with the look and quality of the watch. And i'm planning on buying more from Cucol.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Aderhold

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought for vacation wear. matched up the Puerto Rico apparel nicely. I bought 2
customer_reviews.author: ryan jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality particularly considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality particularly considering the price. I have purchased watch bands that cost more, and the band that comes with this is very good. Keeps great time; it arrived with the correct time displayed. The watch is a little larger than I thought it would be. But, as long as the cuffs on your long sleeve shirt are not too tight, it will work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Usually Ecstatic

customer_reviews.title: almost like a piece of arts and crafts foam
customer_reviews.text: the watch band feels very cheap, almost like a piece of arts and crafts foam. however, its comfortable and i receive compliments for it all the time. you really can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni DiSalvatore

customer_reviews.title: Band is kinda cheap. But for the price it ...
customer_reviews.text: Band is kinda cheap. But for the price it is an interesting conversational piece to say to people that I am wearing a wooden watch.
customer_reviews.author: William Redray

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Cool watch for a casual Friday date, but certainly cannot be worn every day. Will strain with sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is well-made, and a very good price. It is just as nice looking in person as it is in the picture. Definitely glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cool yet classy looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cool and classy. The wooden dial is unique and will match any outfit. The dial and the watch straps are bigger than I expected, but I think it still looks good. Bought this as a gift for my brother and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: Great except the broken second hand
customer_reviews.text: I love these watches and have ordered several. However the last 3 I have ordered the second hand always falls off. Not sure why but it’s disappointing because I love the watches. I’m giving them 1 more shot then gonna move on if this one breaks
customer_reviews.author: Stephen marquez

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Watch - COOL
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a groomsman. Very nice quality, great packaging, arrived early. You can tell the seller really cares about reputation and quality. I think it was great value. I highly recommend this seller and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch for the price! So many compliments and stares when I wear this watch. Great conversation piece. Although if you have small wrists you might have to make your own hole in the band. Luckily my wrist is just right for the smallest hole, and I have rather small wrists
customer_reviews.author: Cord Whiteker

customer_reviews.title: Cool, comfortable watch
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch! Works great, looks even better, and comfortable to wear. I get a ton of compliments on it! I have a small wrist, and the smallest size is a very lose fit for me - but I like that look.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my college age son for Christmas and he loved it! It is a very unique and beautiful watch. The watch itself is very nice but we are probably going to replace the band because my son doesn't like it as much. (I'm sure it's just a matter of preference)
customer_reviews.author: SoonerDuck

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Looks really stylish. The band is extremely lightweight. Actually the entire watch is pretty lightweight. As someone with fairly sensitive skin this watch doesn't bother my wrist at all. It's a great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique I hope quality too
customer_reviews.text: This item was bought as a gift, my friend loved it as he collects watches. I have to say this watch is beautifully made, is just as pictured, I checked and it seemed working well, I hope quality ends up being good too.
customer_reviews.author: Hilmacha

feature_bullets: REAL BAMBOO CASE: No emblem on the face of the watch, This minimal design captures the natural essence of traditional bamboo, with a light, subtle aroma and glass front for protection. The use of bamboo materials is also .

EXCELLENT GIFT BOX: The Cucol Wood New Design Watch is the perfect Christmas gift for husband,friends, relatives or loved ones.Carefully prepared, packaged and delivered to you in our bright beige gift box.
AUTHENTIC LEATHER STRAP: The smooth cowhide leather strap provides maximum comfort even during extended use. While the subtle brown texture expresses class and elegance everywhere you go.

IMPORTED JAPANESE QUARTZ MOVEMENT:Quartz movement operates on a battery power source, which offers long-lasting usage for up to 12 - 24 months.The quartz crystal oscillates at a consistent rate and requires no winding whatsoever, which guarantee's accurate readings every time.
QUALITY GUARANTEE: Each CUCOL Watch is guaranteed to provide you with long-lasting enjoyment, with a modern style that's made from the highest-quality sourced materials.
